Reviews.Title: “A New Year getaway at The Gateway”
Reviews.Author: LinSouthYorkshire
Reviews.Content: family london stayed 4 nights gateway hotel 5 minutes walk clapham south tube station pleasant walk clapham common tube station 17 extension modern clean comfortable staff polite friendly breakfast wasnt available stay 10 minute walk wetherspoons moon water breakfast cafes convenient tube train stations

Reviews.Title: “Nice cheap hotel”

Reviews.Content: hotel clean beds comfortable book disabled partner disabled requested ground floor unfortunately disabled unavailable partner struggle 2 flights stairs staying night mean couldnt leave leaving hotel cheap near tube station

Reviews.Title: “Sleepless in Balham”

Reviews.Content: stayed nights recently convenient family visit close shops cafes restaurants underground friendly receptionist allowed leave luggage arriving £80 night twin cheap include breakfast short staffed pay arrival reception staffed check staff serviced shown door entry exit dropped keys box departure serviceable chair worn carpet hole wash basin cracked hotel close hill busy road kept awake traffic noise sirens loud voices street grounds reuse

Reviews.Title: “amanda”

Reviews.Content: location stayed nights october freindly near clapham south underground located near shops enjoyed stay reasonable especially london highly reccomend busy road london busy location definatly stay thanks stay lovely freindly hotel
